fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You learn who each evil faction vists and how many times they did it, the evil faction will learn if you are in the game, and can choose one member to hide their visit from you.
- Bugging will detect feedback and silent effects they recieved from outside sources. (Roleblocks, Attacked, Doused, Framed, etc...)
